verses.verse: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu And Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֜י <S%H8664><s%> hat-tish-Bi the Tishbite מִתֹּשָׁבֵ֣י <S%H8453><s%> mit-to-sha-Vei [who was] of the inhabitants גִלְעָד֮ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחְאָב֒ <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av unto Ahab חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom עָמַ֣דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mad-ti whom I stand לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- surely יִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַשָּׁנִ֥ים <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nim these years הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these טַ֣ל <S%H2919><s%> tal there shall not be dew וּמָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> u-ma-Tar; nor rain כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki there אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- shall be neither לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi but according דְבָרִֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ri. to my word ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto him saying

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, here וּפָנִ֥יתָ <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ta thee hence and turn לְּךָ֖ le-Cha קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah; thee eastward וְנִסְתַּרְתָּ֙ <S%H5641><s%> ve-nis-tar-Ta and hide בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> be-Na-chal thyself by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <S%H3747><s%> ke-Rit, Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. Jordan

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become מֵהַנַּ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> me-han-Na-chal of the brook תִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> tish-Teh; And it shall be [that] thou shalt drink וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעֹרְבִ֣ים <S%H6158><s%> ha-'o-re-Vim the ravens צִוִּ֔יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti, and I have commanded לְכַלְכֶּלְךָ֖ <S%H3557><s%> le-chal-kel-Cha to feed שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according unto the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, went וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> be-Na-chal by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <S%H3747><s%> ke-Rit, Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. Jordan

וְהָעֹרְבִ֗ים <S%H6158><s%> ve-ha-'o-re-Vim, And the ravens מְבִיאִ֨ים <S%H935><s%> me-vi-'Im brought ל֜וֹ lo לֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem him bread וּבָשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> u-va-Sar and flesh בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וְלֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem and bread וּבָשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> u-va-Sar and flesh בָּעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ba-'A-rev; in the evening וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- from הַנַּ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal of the brook יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> yish-Teh. and he drank

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi happened מִקֵּ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz And it came to pass after יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim a while וַיִּיבַ֣שׁ <S%H3001><s%> vai-yi-Vash dried up הַנָּ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal; that the brook כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah happened גֶ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> Ge-shem because there had been no rain בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto him saying

ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise לֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech go צָרְפַ֙תָה֙ <S%H6886><s%> tza-re-Fa-tah thee to Zarephath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לְצִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> le-tzi-Don, which [belongeth] to Zidon וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-shav-Ta and dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti there behold I have commanded שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-Nah a widow לְכַלְכְּלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3557><s%> le-chal-ke-Le-cha. there to sustain

וַיָּ֣קָם׀ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom So he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went צָרְפַ֗תָה <S%H6886><s%> tza-re-Fa-tah, to Zarephath וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And when he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach to the gate הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, of the city וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- behold שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham was there אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> 'al-ma-Nah behold the widow מְקֹשֶׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H7197><s%> me-ko-She-shet [was] there gathering עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim; of sticks וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, to her and said קְחִי־ <S%H3947><s%> ke-chi- Fetch נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na Please לִ֧י li מְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> me-'at- me I pray thee a little מַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim water בַּכְּלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> bak-ke-Li in a vessel וְאֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> ve-'esh-Teh. that I may drink

וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech was going לָקַ֑חַת <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat; to fetch וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra [it] he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, to her and said לִֽקְחִי־ <S%H3947><s%> lik-chi- Bring נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na Please לִ֛י li פַּת־ <S%H6595><s%> pat- me I pray thee a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem of bread בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dech. in thine hand

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer, And she said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- liveth יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- no יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- I have לִ֣י li מָע֔וֹג <S%H4580><s%> ma-'og, not a cake כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- no מְלֹ֤א <S%H4393><s%> me-Lo all along כַף־ <S%H3709><s%> chaf- branch קֶ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> ke-mach of meal בַּכַּ֔ד <S%H3537><s%> bak-Kad, in a barrel וּמְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> u-me-'at- and a little שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil בַּצַּפָּ֑חַת <S%H6835><s%> batz-tzap-Pa-chat; in a cruse וְהִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> ve-hin-Ni behold מְקֹשֶׁ֜שֶׁת <S%H7197><s%> me-ko-She-shet and behold I [am] gathering שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two עֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim, sticks וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ti that I may go in וַעֲשִׂיתִ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Ti-hu and dress לִ֣י li וְלִבְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Ni, it for me and my son וַאֲכַלְנֻ֖הוּ <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-Nu-hu that we may eat וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> va-Ma-te-nu. it and die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha then אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu And Elijah אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> tir-'I, unto her Fear בֹּ֖אִי <S%H935><s%> Bo-'i not go עֲשִׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si [and] do כִדְבָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H1697><s%> chid-va-Rech; as thou hast said אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach but עֲשִׂי־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si- but make לִ֣י li מִ֠שָּׁם <S%H8033><s%> Mish-shom me thereof עֻגָ֨ה <S%H5692><s%> 'u-Gah cake קְטַנָּ֤ה <S%H6996><s%> ke-tan-Nah a little בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> va-ri-sho-Nah first וְהוֹצֵ֣אתְ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-Tzet and bring לִ֔י Li, וְלָ֣ךְ ve-Lach וְלִבְנֵ֔ךְ <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nech, for thee and for thy son תַּעֲשִׂ֖י <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Si make בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <S%H314><s%> ba-'a-cha-ro-Nah. [it] unto me and after ס sa-Mek

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹה֩ <S%H3541><s%> choh thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כַּ֤ד <S%H3537><s%> kad The barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> hak-Ke-mach of meal לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִכְלָ֔ה <S%H3615><s%> tich-Lah, shall not waste וְצַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> ve-tzap-Pa-chat neither shall the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men of oil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תֶחְסָ֑ר <S%H2637><s%> tech-Sar; fail עַ֠ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom until the day; תִּתֶּן־ tit-ten- כתֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> tet- sends יְהוָ֛ה <S%H5414><s%> ha-shem sendeth קגֶּ֖שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> Ge-shem rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. the earth

וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech went וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> vat-ta-'a-Seh and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the saying אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu; of Elijah וַתֹּ֧אכַל <S%H398><s%> vat-To-chal did eat; הוּא־ hu- והיא va-hi כהִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> hi- he וָה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> va-Hu he קוּבֵיתָ֖הּ <S%H1004><s%> u-vei-Tah and she and he and her house יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. [many] days

כַּ֤ד <S%H3537><s%> kad [And] the barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <S%H7058><s%> hak-Ke-mach of meal לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor כָלָ֔תָה <S%H3615><s%> cha-La-tah, wasted וְצַפַּ֥חַת <S%H6835><s%> ve-tzap-Pa-chat not neither did the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men of oil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor חָסֵ֑ר <S%H2638><s%> cha-Ser; fail כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> kid-Var according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he spake בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad by אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah פ Peh
